content.rendered:
Looking for a Color Wow Australia stockist?

Exciting news!!  We now have a dedicated store ‘Luxe Hair Concepts’ where you can buy Color Wow products online!

Click here to go directly to the Color Wow page – and don’t forget to Join Our VIP Club – first time purchases get 15% OFF!

Not sure what Color Wow product will suit you? Call Us to discuss, we are happy to offer you an over the phone consult!  Purchase Online and we will arrange delivery to anywhere in Australia.

Luxe Hair Concepts proudly stocks high-performing luxury hair care brands from around the world while giving our guests insight into the professional world of luxury hair care. Our extensive professional knowledge of how to best care for your hair can be discovered in our original content and how-to videos.

excerpt.rendered: Color Wow is a compact, capsule collection of ground-breaking, problem-solvers for colour-treated hair.
